There were no other sightings in Rio Rico Southeast on or around January 28th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsi walked outside of my house and walked to my car to get my ciggarettes out i stuck half of my body in the car as i reached to get the ciggarettes i looked out of the front windshield and saw the sun was glaring off an object in the sky so i took a better look at it and it seemed like a cigar shaped object gliding in sky i took yet a better look at it and it did not have winds or nothing in common to any aircraft i have seen around here it also seemed to have an ora around it looked like smoke and it made no noise threw the sky of any engines on the aircraft an all aircrafts that pass threw here need to be heard because they echo loudly threw the mountains when they pass threw there and it was silent today
